author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Itron Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $3.74
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Itron Inc:
* ITRON ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $3.74 * Q1 REVENUE $607 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $572.6 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* TOTAL BACKLOG OF $3.1 BILLION AT QUARTER END, COMPARED WITH $1.6 BILLION AT END OF Q1 OF 2017
* BOOKINGS IN QUARTER TOTALED $557 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
